title: Alex Mellor
text:
Alex Mellor (born 1994) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a forward and for the <a href="Leeds%20Rhinos">Leeds Rhinos</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Super%20League">Betfred Super League</a>. 
He has previously played for the <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford Bulls</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> and the <a href="Kingstone%20Press%20Championship">Kingstone Press Championship</a>, and the <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield Giants</a> in the Super League.
Background.
Alex Mellor was born in <a href="Halifax%2C%20West%20Yorkshire">Halifax</a>, <a href="West%20Yorkshire%2C%20England">West Yorkshire, England</a>.
Bradford Bulls.
Mellor had been involved in the <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford Bulls</a> scholarship system from under-15's.
2013.
He featured in Round 20 (<a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington Wolves</a>) and Round 27 (<a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield Giants</a>).
2014.
Mellor featured in the pre-season game against <a href="Hull%20F.C.">Hull FC</a>.
He featured in Round 10 (<a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan Warriors</a>) to Round 13 (<a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield Giants</a>) then in Round 21 (<a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield Giants</a>) to Round 23 (<a href="Leeds%20Rhinos">Leeds Rhinos</a>). He played in Round 27 (<a href="London%20Broncos">London Broncos</a>).
He signed a new 1 Year Deal with the Bulls despite their relegation to the <a href="Championship%20%28rugby%20league%29">Championship</a>.
2015.
Mellor featured in the pre-season friendlies against <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a> and <a href="Leeds%20Rhinos">Leeds Rhinos</a>.
He featured in Round 1 (<a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a>) to Round 4 (<a href="Hunslet%20R.L.F.C.">Hunslet Hawks</a>) then in Round 9 (<a href="London%20Broncos">London Broncos</a>) to Round 16 (<a href="Doncaster%20R.L.F.C.">Doncaster</a>). Alex played in Qualifier 3 (<a href="Salford%20Red%20Devils">Salford Red Devils</a>) to Qualifier 4 (<a href="Widnes%20Vikings">Widnes Vikings</a>) then in Qualifier 7 (<a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a>). Mellor played in the <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a> in Round 5 (<a href="Hull%20Kingston%20Rovers">Hull Kingston Rovers</a>).
Mid-way through the season Mellor signed a 2 year Extension to his contract.
2016.
Mellor featured in the pre-season friendlies against <a href="Leeds%20Rhinos">Leeds Rhinos</a> and <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a>. He scored against <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a> (1 try).
He featured in Round 2 (<a href="Whitehaven%20R.L.F.C.">Whitehaven</a>) to Round 3 (<a href="Swinton%20Lions">Swinton Lions</a>) then in Round 5 (<a href="Oldham%20R.L.F.C.">Oldham</a>) to Round 7 (<a href="London%20Broncos">London Broncos</a>). He played in Round 10 (<a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a>) to Round 13 (<a href="Swinton%20Lions">Swinton Lions</a>) then in Round 15 (<a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a>). Alex featured in Round 17 (<a href="Workington%20Town">Workington Town</a>) to Round 21 (<a href="Whitehaven%20R.L.F.C.">Whitehaven</a>) then in Round 23 (<a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a>). Alex featured in the Championship Shield Game 1 (<a href="Whitehaven%20R.L.F.C.">Whitehaven</a>) to the Final (<a href="Sheffield%20Eagles">Sheffield Eagles</a>). Mellor played in the <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a> in the 4th Round (<a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a>). He scored against <a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a> (3 tries), <a href="Oldham%20R.L.F.C.">Oldham</a> (1 try), <a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a> (1 try), <a href="Whitehaven%20R.L.F.C.">Whitehaven</a> (3 tries) and <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a> (1 try).
Huddersfield Giants.
2017.
Following Bradford's liquidation before the 2017 season, he signed a 3 Year Deal with <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> side <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield Giants</a>.
Mellor featured in Round 1 (<a href="Widnes%20Vikings">Widnes Vikings</a>) to Round 6 (<a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan Warriors</a>). He scored against <a href="Salford%20Red%20Devils">Salford Red Devils</a> (2 tries)
Leeds Rhinos.
2020.
On 17 October 2020, he played in the <a href="2020%20Challenge%20Cup%20Final">2020 Challenge Cup Final</a> victory for Leeds over Salford at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium">Wembley Stadium</a>.
